td.content: s:patient presents with severe numbness and tingling sensation in foot, severe rib tenderness, severe pain radiating from the back to the feet and Body Aches for past 7 days. patient is a 40 yo m. he denies drinking alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 173 cm, Weight 57 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15, CBC WBC=20000 /mm3,Hgb=8 mg/dL,Hct=30 %, Basic Metabolic Panel creatinine=4 mg/dL,BUN=80 mg/dL,Ca=12 mg/dL, serum protein electrophoresis shows monoclonal M spike, patient appears in severe distress due to pain a:Low Back Pain p:administered gabapentin - 300 mg po tid x 7 days, performed CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, serum protein electrophoresis, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a male aged 41 years presents with severe numbness and tingling sensation in foot, severe pain radiating from the back to the feet, Body Aches. he has history of severe rib tenderness. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 56.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17, Back = low lumbar spinal tenderness, paraspinous muscle spasm on the right, decrease ROM in all direction a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered MRI Spine.
